info.name: StackOverflow - Atom One Dark
info.description: A StackOverflow theme based on the popular Atom One Dark theme.
info.additionalInfo: A fork from New Dev's Dark StackOverflow (which is, itself, a fork). This theme isn't entirely complete because StackOverflow is always changing their CSS, but it's currently at a point that I'm pretty happy with and I hope it works well for you too. The colors are mostly sourced directly from the original Atom One Dark Theme repo. Keeping the license: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
